main event: Two Marine officers sighted an unidentified flying object in Okinawa on 29 October 1960.
interesting points: The object demonstrated pulsating red colors and oscillated up and down while remaining mostly in the same area., The object appeared round to oval in shape and was observed for approximately 5-7 minutes., It moved towards the observers before receding and disappearing entirely., The observers reported the sighting occurred under clear visibility conditions at night., Officers concluded that this was not a weather balloon due to the time difference of its release and sighting.
sighted object: a pulsating red object in the sky
witness description: Marine officers, including Major Charles R. Burrough
